com.model

Class Gun

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.model.Gun
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GunPowerups

    public class Gun
extends java.lang.Object
    Houses all the properties of the hero's gun, as well as keeping track of the bullets.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Gun(GameLogic gameLogic)
      Constructor for a Gun, needs gameLogic to add bodies and extract information about the hero's position.
